thread.title: Water-Main Break at JFK Exacerbates Airline Travel Woes

author: Paul Berger
title: Water-Main Break at JFK Exacerbates Airline Travel Woes

organizations.name: jfk exacerbates airline travel woes cleanup

text:
Cleanup after the winter storm that battered the Northeast continued to be slow for airlines over the weekend, hampered by more problems at New Yorkâ€™s John F. Kennedy International Airport, as a water-main break shut down arrivals at an international terminal.
Flight-tracking service FlightAware.com said nearly 550 flights were canceled in the U.S. as of late Sunday afternoon, and nearly 3,400 were delayed, meaning more than 15 minutes late. At JFK alone, 96 flights were canceled.
